Name: Buttermelt Roast Lv.2
Description2$english: It is said that whenever someone starts cooking this dish in the communal kitchen of the apartment building, others will try to follow suit because the enticing aroma of butter and fried meat is too tempting. The scent can seep through any ventilation gap, making anyone who smells it feel their heart flutter.

recipes.Name: Buttermelt Roast
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.1, Lv.2, and Lv.3 at rates of 50%, 40%, and 10%, respectively.
Once a single tenant begins cooking this in the communal kitchen, others swiftly follow. The wondrous scent of blooming herbs, garden-fresh vegetables, and sizzling pork in butter and cream seeps into every nook and cranny—awakening envy and hunger in all who catch its drift.
recipes.Des$english:
Crafting yields products Lv.1, Lv.2, and Lv.3 at rates of 50%, 40%, and 10%, respectively.
Once a single tenant begins cooking this in the communal kitchen, others swiftly follow. The wondrous scent of blooming herbs, garden-fresh vegetables, and sizzling pork in butter and cream seeps into every nook and cranny—awakening envy and hunger in all who catch its drift.

NeedMaterial.Name: Exquisite Raw Meat
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Top-tier processed fresh meat, not only retaining the ultimate flavor but also achieving a perfect balance of fat and lean through exquisite Artisanship, requiring only a skilled cook to transform it into a feast for gourmets.

recipes.Name: Exquisite Raw Meat
recipes.Des:
Can process beast meat into Exquisite Raw Meat that can be used as a top-grade ingredient.
This process yields 6-7 products.
recipes.Des$english:
Can process beast meat into Exquisite Raw Meat that can be used as a top-grade ingredient.
This process yields 6-7 products.

NeedMaterial.Name: Raw Shiny Meat
NeedMaterial.Description: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Meat obtained from wild creatures, the final taste depends entirely on the adventurer's cooking skills.

NeedMaterial.Name: Granny Pine
NeedMaterial.Description: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare underwater fungus regarded as a treasure beneath the sea.

NeedMaterial.Name: Butter
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Rich in nutrients but high in fat, so don't overconsume it.

NeedMaterial.Name: Fresh Milk

NeedMaterial.Description$english: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: The pure white nectar that fuels morning energy.
